strapi-localize.plugin.name: DeepL Translate
strapi-localize.settings.title: Settings
strapi-localize.settings.apiKey.hint: Enter your DeepL API key (Free or Pro)
strapi-localize.settings.autoTranslate.h: Automatically translate content when it's created or updated
strapi-localize.settings.ignoredFields.h: Select fields that should not be translated
Please ensure you have content types with i18n enabled
strapi-localize.home.title: DeepL Translate
strapi-localize.home.noContent.descripti: No content available for translation in this content type
strapi-localize.home.selectContent: Please select content and target language
strapi-localize.home.autoTranslationStat: Auto-translation can be configured in the Settings page for each content type
strapi-localize.home.description: This plugin automatically translates your content using DeepL API. Configure your API key and content type settings to get started.
